body.p: When an entity obtains financial or non‑financial assets during the period by taking possession of collateral it holds as security or calling on other credit enhancements (eg guarantees), and such assets meet the recognition criteria in other IFRSs, an entity shall disclose for such assets held at the reporting date:

li.p: the nature and carrying amount of the assets; and
when the assets are not readily convertible into cash, its policies for disposing of such assets or for using them in its operations.
